gui.buildinggadgets.help.area.arrow.data: Represents the flow of data from one item to another; either from a template to a zapper/template, or from a zapper/template to a template or piece of paper
gui.buildinggadgets.help.area.preview: Preview of the data stored in the zapper/template
gui.buildinggadgets.help.area.slot.gadge: Accepts §ncopy-paste zapper§r or §ntemplate§r to be saved/copied from and loaded to \n\n§9Colored overlay§r indicates that the item will receive data
gui.buildinggadgets.help.button.copy: Copies data from a zapper/template to your computer's clipboard
gui.buildinggadgets.help.button.load: Loads data onto a zapper/template from a template
gui.buildinggadgets.help.button.save: Saves the data in the zapper/template to a pre-existing template, or to a piece of paper, creating a template
